DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to the assessment of pelvic floor symptoms and patientsÂ´ satisfaction after bilateral sacrospinous fixation for the primary treatment of pelvic organ prolapse stage IV.
DOC.brief_title: Pelvic Floor Symptoms After Bilateral Sacrospinous Fixation
DOC.criteria: age 18 and above pelvic organ prolapse ICSPOPQ Stage IV, with or without uterus signed informed consent gynecologic surgery in the three past months before planned surgery history of prolapse surgery participation in another study need to simultaneously perform other surgical procedures (i.e. rectopexy) ongoing chemotherapy of treatment with immunosuppressant drugs
